data.title: Inns in Sardinia
data.text:
Featuring complimentary parking, allergy free rooms and a terrace, Casa Ilva Hotel offers family-friendly accommodation in La Maddalena. Cala Martinella is 3.6 km from the venue, and La Galatea is…

The 2-star Banga-An Bnb And Coffee House Sagada is set a 25-minute stroll from Bangaan and 3.3 km from The Episcopal Church of Saint Mary the Virgin. This Sagada inn also includes parking.

The 3-star Da Renzo Hotel is located in Siamaggiore, 7 km from Church of Santa Chiara, and offers an outdoor pool. Guests who stay at the inn can park their car on site.

Locanda Tipica Sa Corte is located 15 minutes' walk from Nostra Signora d'Itria and 15 minutes' walk away from Santa Maria. This venue comprises 10 rooms with climate control, a multi-channel…

Il Busciolotto Hotel Santa Teresa Gallura is 70 km from Olbia airport and has airport shuttle bus service and car rentals available for guests. This Santa Teresa Gallura inn is located 5 minutes on…

Located 135 km from Elmas airport, Su Pasu Hotel Tortoli offers guided tour service and 24-hour reception as well as bicycle for rent. Guests can visit San Gemiliano tower in Tortoli, situated within…

Eliseo'S Rooms Triei offers a terrace, located nearly 25 minutes' walk from Grutta e Janas. Featuring 10 rooms with views of the patio, this Triei inn is set within 3.4 km of Visite guidate grotta Su…

Locanda B&B Dandana Orgosolo, located 3.9 km from Chiesa dello Spirito Santo, features a free carpark and a barber shop. Locanda B&B Dandana is near Parrocchia S Pietro Apostolo.

Locanda Di Corte is within walking distance of many of the attractions including Centro Storico Bosa and Chiesa Beata Vergine del Carmine.

Ristoro Norghio Hotel Irgoli, located 1.4 km from Fonte nuragica di Su Notante, features free Wi Fi throughout the venue. Area archeologica di Janna' e Pruna is 1.4 km away from Ristoro Norghio Hotel.

Situated near the appliance store "Porra' Commerciale S.n.c. Di Pili Chiara", the 3-star Locanda Degli Artisti Tortoli features flat-screen TV and a flat screen TV. 3.4 km from Spiaggia del Lido di…

Set approximately 5 minutes on foot from Life Church, the 2-star Marian Pension El Nido is located 5 minutes' stroll from El Nido Public Market. Guests will have access to parking on site for added…

At a 43 km distance from Church of the Nativity of John the Baptist, Zajazd Michalowo includes 10 rooms. This Michalowo inn offers Wi Fi in public areas and has a work desk and a xerox.

Relais Borgo Camisa Hotel Castiadas is set within 5 minutes' drive of SuperMarket di Meglio and a 10-minute ride from Cuili Piras. This Castiadas inn offers 17 guest rooms with views of the garden.

La Casa Rossa Hotel Riola Sardo, located 4.8 km from Nuraghe Accas, features free Wi-Fi throughout the venue. The Inn provides 24 hour front desk assistance and housekeeping.

Set 1 km from the centre of Giba, Locanda Rosella offers free WiFi in public areas. This venue is a 25-minute walk from Nuraghe de Is Fais, about 10 minutes' drive from Nuraghe Cambulas.

Located just a few minutes' walk from Sant'Ignazio, Locanda Gicappa features dining options including the gastronomic restaurant.

The 2-star Hostal Jardin is nestled at 250 metres of Centro Historico de Jardin and features a first aid kit and fire extinguishers. The smoke-free inn offers place to stay with Wi Fi throughout the…
